docblock.description: This interface prescribes which methods a class must implement to serve as object encapsulation of PHP's native ldap result resource and related functions.
Create a new instance
Retrieve the LDAP pagination cookie

tag.name: return
tag.description: Array with two keys: 'cookie' and 'estimated'

docblock.description: Count the number of entries in a search

tag.name: return
tag.description: Number of entries in the result

docblock.description: Free result memory
docblock.long-description: Once the result is freed from memory the instance holding the result must not be used any further. This method must be called automatically when the instance is released from memory.

docblock.description: Get all result entries

tag.name: return
tag.description: Complete result information in a multi-dimensional array

docblock.description: Extract information about referrals (if returned by server)
Sort LDAP result entries

tag.name: param
tag.description: The attribute to use as a key in the sort

tag.name: fluent
tag.description: This method is part of a fluent interface and will return the same instance

docblock.description: This interface prescribes which methods a class must implement to serve as object encapsulation of PHP's native ldap link resource and related functions.
Create a new instance
docblock.long-description: If $ldapUrl is provided, it should also open connection to the ldap server by calling self::connect()

tag.name: param
tag.description: Optional ldap URI string of the ldap server

docblock.description: Convert DN to User Friendly Naming format

tag.name: param
tag.description: The distinguished name of an LDAP entity

tag.name: return
tag.description: The user friendly name

docblock.description: Convert LDAP error number into string error message

tag.name: param
tag.description: The error number

tag.name: return
tag.description: The error message, as a string

docblock.description: Splits DN into its component parts

tag.name: param
tag.description: The distinguished name of an LDAP entity

tag.name: param
tag.description: Used to request if the RDNs are returned with only values or their attributes as well

tag.name: return
tag.description: Returns an array of all DN components

docblock.description: Get the PHP's native ldap resource object

tag.name: return
tag.description: (ldap link)

docblock.description: Add entries to LDAP directory

tag.name: param
tag.description: The distinguished name of an LDAP entity

tag.name: param
tag.description: An array that specifies the information about the entry

tag.name: fluent
tag.description: This method is part of a fluent interface and will return the same instance

docblock.description: Compare value of attribute found in entry specified with DN

tag.name: param
tag.description: The distinguished name of an LDAP entity

tag.name: param
tag.description: The attribute name

tag.name: param
tag.description: The compared value

tag.name: return
tag.description: Returns TRUE if value matches otherwise returns FALSE

docblock.description: Delete an entry from a directory

tag.name: param
tag.description: The distinguished name of an LDAP entity

tag.name: fluent
tag.description: This method is part of a fluent interface and will return the same instance

docblock.description: Open connection to an ldap server

tag.name: param
tag.description: Ldap URI string of the ldap server (i.e. ldap://my.server.com:389)

tag.name: fluent
tag.description: This method is part of a fluent interface and will return the same instance

docblock.description: Send LDAP pagination control

tag.name: param
tag.description: The number of entries by page

tag.name: param
tag.description: Indicates whether the pagination is critical of not

tag.name: param
tag.description: An opaque structure sent by the server

tag.name: fluent
tag.description: This method is part of a fluent interface and will return the same instance

docblock.description: Bind to LDAP directory

tag.name: param
tag.description: Username for the bind

tag.name: param
tag.description: Password for the username

tag.name: fluent
tag.description: This method is part of a fluent interface and will return the same instance

docblock.description: Return the LDAP error message of the last LDAP command
Return the LDAP error number of the last LDAP command
Get the current value for given option

tag.name: param
tag.description: The option to be returned

docblock.description: Add attribute values to current attributes

tag.name: param
tag.description: The distinguished name of an LDAP entity

tag.name: param
tag.description: Values to be added to the specified attributes

tag.name: fluent
tag.description: This method is part of a fluent interface and will return the same instance

docblock.description: Delete attribute values from current attributes

tag.name: param
tag.description: The distinguished name of an LDAP entity

tag.name: param
tag.description: Values to be deleted from the specified attributes

tag.name: fluent
tag.description: This method is part of a fluent interface and will return the same instance

docblock.description: Compatibility alias for self::modDelete()
Replace attribute values with new ones

tag.name: param
tag.description: The distinguished name of an LDAP entity

tag.name: param
tag.description: Attributes and their values to be replaced

tag.name: fluent
tag.description: This method is part of a fluent interface and will return the same instance

docblock.description: Modify an LDAP entry

tag.name: param
tag.description: The distinguished name of an LDAP entity

tag.name: param
tag.description: Attributes with their modified values

tag.name: fluent
tag.description: This method is part of a fluent interface and will return the same instance

docblock.description: Modify the name of an entry

tag.name: param
tag.description: The distinguished name of an LDAP entity

tag.name: param
tag.description: The new RDN

tag.name: param
tag.description: The new parent/superior entry

tag.name: param
tag.description:
If TRUE the old RDN value(s) is removed, else the old RDN value(s) is retained as

                         non-distinguished values of the entry

tag.name: fluent
tag.description: This method is part of a fluent interface and will return the same instance

docblock.description: Bind to LDAP directory using SASL

tag.name: fluent
tag.description: This method is part of a fluent interface and will return the same instance

docblock.description: Search LDAP tree

tag.name: param
tag.description: The base DN for the directory

tag.name: param
tag.description: Ldap query filter ( an empty filter is not allowed )

tag.name: param
tag.description: An array of the required attributes, e.g. array("mail", "sn", "cn")

tag.name: param
tag.description: Subtree, one-level or base

tag.name: param
tag.description: Should be set to 1 if only attribute types are wanted

tag.name: param
tag.description: Enables you to limit the count of entries fetched. Setting this to 0 means no limit

tag.name: param
tag.description: Sets the number of seconds how long is spend on the search. Setting this to 0 means no limit.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Specifies how aliases should be handled during the search

docblock.description: Set the value of the given option

tag.name: param
tag.description: An lDAP option constant

tag.name: param
tag.description: The new value for the option

docblock.description: Set a callback function to do re-binds on referral chasing

tag.name: fluent
tag.description: This method is part of a fluent interface and will return the same instance

docblock.description: Compatibility alias of self::setRebindProcedure()
Start TLS
Unbind from LDAP directory

docblock.description: Custom exception that represents an error from PHP's native ldap interface

docblock.long-description: The error code and message are extracted from the LinkResource instance.

docblock.description: Search LDAP tree
docblock.long-description:
This method deviates from the native PHP implementation - there is only one method to perform search, list and read operations. The scope of the operation is controlled by the $scope parameter, which can be one of:
self::SCOPE_SUBTREE - equivalent of ldap_search() ( default ) self::SCOPE_ONELEVEL - equivalent of ldap_list() self::SCOPE_BASE - equivalent of ldap_read()

tag.name: param
tag.description: The base DN for the directory

tag.name: param
tag.description: Ldap query filter ( an empty filter is not allowed )

tag.name: param
tag.description: An array of the required attributes, e.g. array("mail", "sn", "cn")

tag.name: param
tag.description: One of self::SCOPE_SUBTREE, self::SCOPE_ONELEVEL or self::SCOPE_BASE

tag.name: param
tag.description: Should be set to 1 if only attribute types are wanted

tag.name: param
tag.description: Enables you to limit the count of entries fetched. Setting this to 0 means no limit

tag.name: param
tag.description: Sets the number of seconds how long is spend on the search. Setting this to 0 means no limit.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Specifies how aliases should be handled during the search

docblock.description: Set the value of the given option

tag.name: param
tag.description: An lDAP option constant

tag.name: param
tag.description: The new value for the option

docblock.description: Set a callback function to do re-binds on referral chasing

tag.name: fluent
tag.description: This method is part of a fluent interface and will return the same instance

docblock.description: Compatibility alias of self::setRebindProcedure()
Start TLS

tag.name: fluent
tag.description: This method is part of a fluent interface and will return the same instance

docblock.description: Unbind from LDAP directory
docblock.long-description: Once unbound the instance holding the link resource must not be used any further.

docblock.description: Check the ldap status code and throw exception on error
